thread.section_title: ScreenPrinting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ScreenPrinting.com | screenprinting.com
thread.title: Phil Dynan

author: Phil Dynan
title: Phil Dynan
text: I would rate the products and service at Ryonet as 5 star. But the shipping protocol I would rate as a 1 star. I ordered products which came in three boxes - two boxes were delivered after dark (mid-evening) by "OnTrac". The third box never arrived and when I contacted OnTrac they said they were holding it and had not notified ANYONE. They told me it was my responsibility to contact Ryonet. I phoned Ryonet and was told that they had no idea OnTrac was holding the box. The Rep also commented that OnTrac bills them for "storage" of boxes that OnTrac has damaged and doesn't report. I asked Ryonet not to use that shipper for future shipments, but they did anyway. So I got the last box a week late. Love the products, availability, and Customer Service Reps, but not the shipping procedure. Also - I was charged $15 for shipping a $14 squeegee - seemed a little out of line...
